website_summaries.verdict: Evermor naturally alkaline Artesian water has the satisfying texture and flavor of spring water, but with the additional benefits of alkaline water. We recommend it for those with digestive issues associated with high acidity levels, such as GERD, IBS and "silent" acid reflux.
pros: Natural alkalinity, will not drop in pH over time
Very effective against GERD and acid reflux symptoms
Artesian water source, not a chemically enhanced municipal source
cons: More expensive than comparable store-brand spring waters
Flavor profile may be saltier than expected
Bottled in PETE plastic, which can leach chemicals

customer_reviews.title: Tested the pH and....WINNER!
customer_reviews.text: So, after being thoroughly confused about whether or not I should buy this based on the reviews, I bought it. When it arrived, I immediately got my pool pH kit and tested it out. As you can see in the pic, it appears to be much higher than 8.0! So, that's pretty cool. Also, tasted pretty good. I also tested my tap water, and it looked to be about 7.2, so my kit is working. :) Just thought I'd share.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Walsh

customer_reviews.title: Great water for my GERD
customer_reviews.text: Great water for my GERD. Dr. Kaufman, perhaps the foremost expert on "silent reflux" drinks it and recommended it to me. Glad that Amazon Prime takes care of the shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Irene Rinker

customer_reviews.title: Best tasting water EVER!! Love Evamor <3
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure if I feel all the good benefits that they claim to have, honestly. However, this is the best tasting water I have drank in my life so far. Way better than Evian, Fiji, or Smart Water for sure. I ordered it on Amazon to try out first, but now I go to a local grocery store which sells a lot cheaper than Amazon. I would never go back to drinking Kirkland, Aquafina, Dasani, or Deer Park.
customer_reviews.author: Sugarbomb

customer_reviews.title: I know this is going to sound strange, but ...
customer_reviews.text: I know this is going to sound strange, but this water wasn't all that smooth. It was slightly metallic. There is such thing as too much Alkaline in your water. I bought this 4-pack with my Prime membership for $16, but found it yesterday at my local WHOLE FOODS for $10. I bought this for the Ph level...but will not be purchasing more.
customer_reviews.author: Lydia Cook

customer_reviews.title: Great for GERD
customer_reviews.text: Alkaline water is great in healing GERD. I drink it instead of regular water which actually makes my GERD worse. I've tried a few other brands of alkaline water and I've found this one to be the most effective and I like the flavor the best. In order to get relief and sustain relief from GERD, this is the only beverage I consume.
customer_reviews.author: Johannah Hopes

customer_reviews.title: It's Good
customer_reviews.text: I bought this water because of a recommendation from a book I was reading about acid reflux. I'm doing so many things to curb the reflux issue that I'm not sure what role this water is playing in helping that issue, that aside, I like the flavor and smell of the water. It's earthy and loaded with minerals. I like it so much, I subscribed.
customer_reviews.author: Nola E. Sayne

customer_reviews.title: Great water; terrible price
customer_reviews.text: Love that it’s alkaline and from a fresh water source. Tastes very good. Also like the wide mouth opening; much easier to drink from. What I don’t like is the insanely high price. Right now, I can buy a 50 ml bottle of Icelandic alkaline (8.4) spring water at Sprouts for $2! That’s less than HALF the price per ounce as this water. Will not buy again unless price becomes reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: JAG

customer_reviews.title: Great for back pain!!
customer_reviews.text: Water tastes perfect: fresh, clean, no aftertaste. I'm 57, had back surgery eight years ago but pain continues to be a daily occurrence. Have tried many treatments and medications. Nothing has ever had this effect. The water allowed me to reduce my medications by two thirds. I used to take Tylenol three times a day for months...six tablets in all (!). From the first day of trying Evamor, and consistently for the past seven months, I have only needed to take two Tylenol tablets once daily. My liver is grateful. My 81-year-old Dad absolutely loves it too, said it makes him feel better over all, more energized.
customer_reviews.author: justme

customer_reviews.title: Evanor Evermore
customer_reviews.text: I never buy bottled water but I had to right now, I was surprised by it because it was so good. This is a larger size (about 2 quarts each) but I drink nothing but filtered water.or Rooibos tea made with filtered water. This is Artesian water the most pure of them all. I would say to put the water is a glass container as plastic bottles do have a problem with that plastic taste everyone complains about. I really haven't found that much plastic taste in this. I'm not an expert on different brands of bottled water but I like this one and would buy it again. The bottle can be recycled.
customer_reviews.author: Gee

customer_reviews.title: Love this water!
customer_reviews.text: I deal with GERD issues, so I was looking for a high alkaline water that might help a bit with that, and this fit the bill perfectly. It's a very smooth and delicious water, and it really helps 'put out the fire' in your throat when GERD starts raging for me. I try to drink one a day, and it seems to really help me control my acid reflux, especially if I drink some before bed. I will continue to swear by this water. It can be a bit pricey, but it's well worth it to me.
customer_reviews.author: ThistleFlower

customer_reviews.title: Helps With Acid Reflux!
customer_reviews.text: I have silent acid reflux and this great tasting Natural Artesian water with it's high PH balance helps flush out the acids in my esophagus. Anyone with this problem should drink this water and will see a significant difference with their reflux. Dr Jamie Koufman who wrote "The Chronic Cough Enigma" and "Dropping Acid" books highly recommends this water. I drink it all day long and did see a significant difference with my acid reflux!
customer_reviews.author: Christine Lurie

customer_reviews.title: I hate water, but I like this Evamor
customer_reviews.text: I hate water, but I like this Evamor. Can't speak to whether or not it makes me feel like a superhero but it is clean tasting and refreshing. I wish it was more reasonably priced but with speedy delivery by Amazon and not having to lug it home, can't complain too much. Good water, would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jameelah

customer_reviews.title: Delicious Clean Smooth Water! A must buy!
customer_reviews.text: Delicious... Smooth...does winders for my silent reflux I'm a happy Evamor Natural Alkaline water drinker. Please try it!!
customer_reviews.author: Leslie-Robin

customer_reviews.title: Good For What Ails You!
customer_reviews.text: I have a problem with chronic dehydration. My ND recommended alkaline water, specifically Artesian water. I have had great results. The minerals in the water boosted my magnesium and potassium levels. Now, I have very few episodes of weakness! I recommend using a slice of lemon or orange to cover the mineral taste. I have heightened tastes due to neurological issues... my friends tell me they like the taste of the water. Enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: Cindyp623

customer_reviews.title: My wife says this water is wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: This water was recommended to my wife. She now swears by it. The information on the bottles would appear to be 100% correct.
customer_reviews.author: Skip

customer_reviews.title: Works for reflux!!
customer_reviews.text: This really does help. I have acute LPR (reflux that comes up to the throat) and within 2-3 days of exclusively drinking this water, I was significantly better. It is pricey though so I plan to use it when I have my reflux flares and use alkaline water pitchers on an ongoing basis.
customer_reviews.author: SallyK

customer_reviews.title: Hightest Ph NATURALLY alkalized water available
customer_reviews.text: No one in my area carries this. Amazon seems to be the place. It's great because medically, I must drink the highest NATURALLY alkalized water I can find. Evamor is the one.
customer_reviews.author: Miz Brody

customer_reviews.title: I don't normally indulge in writing product reviews, albeit ...
customer_reviews.text: I don't normally indulge in writing product reviews, albeit I do read many; however, this water is nothing short of TRUE. Try this test: go a few hours drinking no water or other liquid. Then have a cup or more of this water. VOILA...you'll feel it!
customer_reviews.author: Argo Naut Jason

customer_reviews.title: It is truly alkaline
customer_reviews.text: I tested it with my PH tester, and it does have about 8 PH balance. It is the second brand of alkaline water I have found that lives up to the expectations and conforms with its specifications. Tastes good too. The only problem was a bad packaging (the box was damaged) but who cares as long as the bottles were OK. Delivery was slightly delayed but it didn't bother me either. Recommended for those who are seeking for a true alkaline water.
customer_reviews.author: Marina

customer_reviews.title: There were leaks.
customer_reviews.text: This shipment had wetness inside the plastic packaging though it was not possible to determine which bottle(s) had the leak.
customer_reviews.author: R. SELIG

customer_reviews.title: Great tasting water!!!
customer_reviews.text: We love this water!! I only wish I could find it locally so the poor postal lady didn't have to carry the large box they are shipped in. She actually asked me to carry them in for her. The water is very sweet which I appreciate and it really does seem to quench the thirst when others don't. My entire family loves this water and given our drought right now, completely makes sense to buy bottled water that doesn't come from Cali! We go through about 12 of these per week! Buying again and again!
customer_reviews.author: Caligirl

customer_reviews.title: Dirt In Plastic Around Bottles
customer_reviews.text: I've been buying this for a few months and normally have no problem. Today, however, I received 2 deliveries, both with fine, powdery dirt inside the plastic that encases the 4-bottle pack. The bottles were severely scratched, one looks like it could break open due to abrasions. Certainly doesn't look safe to drink.
customer_reviews.author: Nurtural Mom

customer_reviews.title: Loved the water
customer_reviews.text: Loved the water, hi alkaline is better for your body. Since I don't have prime though, shipping costs as much as the water!
customer_reviews.author: lonewolf

customer_reviews.title: Really works!
customer_reviews.text: When I bought this product, I was suffering from GERDS. As soon as I started drinking it, I felt as if it was putting the fires out. I am so glad that there is a product out there like this that can help people can back into an alkaline state.
customer_reviews.author: A. Queen

customer_reviews.title: The only thing I drink is this.
customer_reviews.text: If you get acid stomach, start drinking this alkaline water all the time it has a high Ph and can resolve heartburn quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Avid reader

customer_reviews.title: Good, but expensive online.
customer_reviews.text: The water is good but the price is expensive, found it about half the price at a local store.

customer_reviews.title: DOES NOT TASTE ORIGINAL!!!
customer_reviews.text: THIS TIME AROUND, THE WATER BOTTLE SEALS WERE BROKEN. THE WATER TASTED LIKE TAP AND NOT THE SMOOTH TASTE IT NORMALLY HAS!

customer_reviews.title: love this product
customer_reviews.text: love this product.... helps maintain my body in an alkaline state which is optimum for my health. I will be ordering this water on a regular basis . I wish it was in regular supermarkets!!!!
customer_reviews.author: JUDITH LEWIS

customer_reviews.title: Game changer! This tastes amazing!
customer_reviews.text: This water tastes amazing! I'm someone that hates drinking water. Most water tastes gross, but this water is ddifferent. It tastes amazing. So for the first time in my life I drank 64 oz in less than a day because I wanted to, not because I have to :) knowing it has great health benefits is just icing on the proverbial cake!

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, healthy water.
customer_reviews.text: Alkaline water is so important to our overall health! It is much better utilized by our body than the over-processed "Drinking water." Artesian water contains NATURAL minerals that our body needs.Also, the higher ph will counteract the acidic state inside our bodies from eating processed foods. EXCELLENT product!!

customer_reviews.title: Great clean water
customer_reviews.text: I am a water expert. This is the best around. The cost is wonderful comparied to orher companies.

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered by mistake. Thought it was a 12 pack. Highly overpriced. I used to get this same water for $6.98 a six pack. Hence, my mistake for rushing to order so I could have it delivered before the weekend. Won't happen again. Product not returnable. Water not bad, price and returnability is the reason for the rating

customer_reviews.title: Very nice, smooth water
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, smooth water. Definitely tests alkaline with ph strip. Delivery and packaging excellent. Expensive, but at least you're getting what you pay for, and it comes from nature.

customer_reviews.title: Too expensive. But locally. Great water though.
customer_reviews.text: Overpriced. I can get these at the local market for .03/FL OZ and then an additional 15% off for a case. These are three times as much.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Zie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: After a lot of research, I decided that Alkaline water is the best for our system. But it isn't easy to purchase. I like Enamor because it is a natural product, as opposed to the other companies that have additives. And I especially like the fact that I can get it delivered by Amazon. I work full time, but even if I didn't I would have Amazon deliver this.
customer_reviews.author: Roberto1

customer_reviews.title: So refreshing!
customer_reviews.text: I've tried so many high end waters, Evian, Fiji few others, This is this best none compare, then Evian and Fiji and ice mountain believe me, I test the waters!
customer_reviews.author: pamela s. bridges

customer_reviews.title: THIS WORKS!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my Dad and older sister. My sister used to have throbbing pains in her hand which I attribute to arthritis. A week after she started using this water, the pain disappeared. She's never going to drink regular water but finds this expensive. She's now getting alkaline water from Trader Joe's which is more affordable.
customer_reviews.author: OS

customer_reviews.title: Good front-palate, but drying finish.
customer_reviews.text: I like high pH waters not for any proclaimed benefit, but because I like the taste. They are usually very rich, oily and sweet tasting. (High pH= soap, get it?) Evamor is ok in this regard, but has quite a pronounced drying (astringent) quality, which leads me to believe in high concentrations of Calcium and Sulfates. I guess it is "character" in this case if "Evamor" really is a spring water. "Essentia" has the same astringent quality from added minerals. My favorite high-pH water, taste-wise, still is "Qure", which gets its high pH from clever technical ionization rather than dumping in mineral salts. Then again, for people believing in "high pH water benefits", "technology" is probably a dirty word.
customer_reviews.author: Fauntleroy

customer_reviews.title: Amazing how this water helped me eliminate my heartburn issues
customer_reviews.text: Amazing how this water helped me eliminate my heartburn issues. It is one of many adjustments I've made to correct acid reflux.
customer_reviews.author: Ty

customer_reviews.title: Excellent PRODUCT.
customer_reviews.text: One of the best PH water be using it for about five years.
customer_reviews.author: Earnest j.bolling

customer_reviews.title: Too salty
customer_reviews.text: Too much salt! My mouth was dry after drinking. Not good for blood pressure!
customer_reviews.author: Linda Yantin

customer_reviews.title: It's not just water
customer_reviews.text: So, I naturally love water...However, this water is AMAZING! It's extra wet, if that makes sense, and you can practically feel it quench every cell in your body! I drink one a day and it gives me an overall feeling of well being. I think there might be prozac in it :-P
customer_reviews.author: Casey Crawley

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My body general runs "acidic." This water helps me stay in the alkaline range. Update - couple months - using Evamor exclusively, now kidneys hurting..... .
customer_reviews.author: Star Fire

customer_reviews.title: Great water
customer_reviews.text: This water is terrific. I definitely prefer artesian water rather than enhanced water. I found it at my local grocer's for about half the price which made this product even better!

customer_reviews.title: My Favorite Alkaline Water
customer_reviews.text: I love this water because it comes in 64 ounce bottles which is the exact amount of water I need to drink daily and it tastes great!
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great hydrates my body instantly relieves constipation great taste warm or cold n0 1
customer_reviews.author: LisaAmazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A real thirst quencher!
customer_reviews.text: I love this water! I was in the hospital for 6 months 2 years ago and could not drink anything for 4 of those months. I have had a difficult time quenching my thirst since then. But this water does satisfy my thirst with less water. I keep it on hand.
customer_reviews.author: April J. Rosenthal

customer_reviews.title: The BEST pH water on the market
customer_reviews.text: This water feels good in my body...satisfying and wonderful taste. In the heat, Evamor quinces thirst. It also is very helpful for acid reflux. Drinking it regularly, I believe could just stop the problem.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Tastes good but not convinced that it makes any difference after all to drink alkaline water.

customer_reviews.title: expensive water

customer_reviews.title: Helps GERD

customer_reviews.title: ... i got a tiny bit more energy drinking stuff like this.
customer_reviews.text: Gonna sound weird but i got a tiny bit more energy drinking stuff like this.

customer_reviews.title: Very good merchant service.
customer_reviews.text: This was a smooth transaction and the order came through in decent time. The water was recommended by a voice therapist for its higher Ph level. It tastes very good but I am not the best test case for its effectiveness due to complicating factors.
customer_reviews.author: FOLGER CLEAVELAND

customer_reviews.title: Quality product!
customer_reviews.text: Delicious and healthy! I tested the product with my own pH meter and confirmed that the alkalinity measures up to the advertised value. I'm very pleased with the product.
customer_reviews.author: ellembee

customer_reviews.title: Delicious and high quality!
customer_reviews.text: Water is really the only beverage I drink with the only exception of one cup of coffee in the morning. And I'm very particular about the toast and quality. This is great. At first I wasn't sure about the size of each bottle. Now I think it's perfect because I'm always sure to drink as much water as I should each day.
customer_reviews.author: Old Blondie

customer_reviews.title: Received 4 bottles instead of the 12 I purchased
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a pack of 12 and only received a pack of 4. I would never have paid that much for 4 bottles. Please ship the promised quantity.
customer_reviews.author: JGJ

customer_reviews.title: Taste really good and make you drink a lot of water but ...
customer_reviews.text: Taste really good and make you drink a lot of water but the only minus point is a bit expensive if you will have to drink regularly. I tried for few months as my doctor suggested me for my acid reflux but didn't feel any difference but it might help others.
customer_reviews.author: Sanpup

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I can't stop buying this stuff. I swear it goes down faster than normal water. I don't have any of the ailments that they say alkaline water helps but I figured it can't hurt. It's really "smooth" and has no taste at all. At the very least, your water consumption will go up. Mine did.
customer_reviews.author: D.L.

customer_reviews.title: Great Refreshing Water!
customer_reviews.text: I usually drink Fiji water, but I decided to try this brand and I'm glad I did. This is great tasting water and is much more reasonably priced. The sodium content is minimal and natural. This is a better refreshing choice, especially for me during the hot Texas summer.
customer_reviews.author: DoTharp

customer_reviews.title: Evamor Hydration but on clearance?
customer_reviews.text: I like the water very much, and it is smooth to drink and hydrates quickly. What was a little alarming were the reddish-orange stickers on the 6 packs like often seen on Clearance Items. It made me wonder if my water was close to expiration or a discontinued item. I will not give water a bad review because of stickers, but it is questionable.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi Blue

customer_reviews.title: I love this water but I am not sure about the ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this water but I am not sure about the alkaline claims. My cousin tested it and it failed the test. I don't know the answer but I do know it is better tasting than my PUR water filter system
customer_reviews.author: Sandy  Cruz

customer_reviews.title: THIS WATER IS THE BEST TASTE SO GOOD LOVE LOVE LOVE TO DRINK
customer_reviews.text: THIS WATER IS THE BEST TASTE SO GOOD LOVE LOVE LOVE TO DRINK

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with the quality and PH of the Evamor water ...
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with the quality and PH of the Evamor water and product. Will order again in the future. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Nona

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: This water really works. First try and burned like soda going down. After that it was fine. My voice is coming back. Good Stuff 2nd review-Have been using this product for about 7 months, really works with the acid reflux problems. Changed my diet a little and use this water, does what Dr Kuffman says. Love it! I tell everyone about it.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: This is not high alkaline water. PH was 6.5 when tested

customer_reviews.title: this is great alkaline water and I strongly recommended
customer_reviews.text: Although I cancelled this order because I found it locally, this is great alkaline water and I strongly recommended. If you can find it in your local area the price is much better in that the product here is much more pricey.

customer_reviews.title: Great refreshing water
customer_reviews.text: This water is absolutely great for my digestive system. My husband ordered it the first time, I laughed and told him water is water. I was so wrong. I love this water!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best bottled water
customer_reviews.text: This is absolutely the best bottled water. If you suffer from acid reflux disease symptoms, especially atypical reflux (i.e., non-heartburn symptoms), this may be very helpful for you. I drink it everyday to help with my stomach and esophageal discomfort. Compared to other brands of alkaline water, it is also the best sourced that I know of--it is sourced from the ground, and the alkalinity is natural to the water; it's not treated with sodium bicarbonate (--baking soda--) in order to achieve alkalinity. The taste is clean and pure--it is so worth the money, and it's great that it's available from Prime!
customer_reviews.author: Liv S.

customer_reviews.title: I love it.
customer_reviews.text: A few years ago, my doctor asked me to start drinking Evamor because of it's alkaline properties. I got hooked and have been drinking it ever since. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Pamalla K Moes

customer_reviews.title: Great water! Drinking it to flush infection
customer_reviews.text: Great water!!!! Trying to get through an infection and have to drink lots of water. This has been great!!! Love it
customer_reviews.author: Danielle R. Hinds

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff for GERD
customer_reviews.text: Great stuff, fast delilver. Really helps with my GERD. A tad pricey but it's the only game in town that has proper PH - IMHO. Recommend highly.
customer_reviews.author: Notmartha

customer_reviews.title: It's the natural alkaline water that's great. Not alkaline added like other brands
customer_reviews.text: It's the natural alkaline water that's great. Not alkaline added like other brands. The taste is crisp and refreshing. If only it could be packaged in a glass container vs plastic.
customer_reviews.author: MCA

customer_reviews.title: Love Evamor Water
customer_reviews.text: I choose this water because of the higher than normal Ph. The other reason is because it is produced locally in Abita Springs LA. The reason I have not purchased any more from Amazon is because a local Supermarket is selling Evamor for 1/3 the price that Amazon sells it for.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew L. Stewart Sr.

customer_reviews.title: EVERYONE Should "Drop Acid" from Their Diet!
customer_reviews.text: I have been diagnosed with LPR and am drinking Evamor as part of a diet regimen to reduce acid in my system. Credit for this diet regimen is due to Jamie Koufman, MD and her co-authors of "Dropping Acid: The Reflux Diet Cookbook and Cure".
customer_reviews.author: dmstitt

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my daughter when she mows, she loves it !

customer_reviews.title: Very good value
customer_reviews.text: I mean it's water so what do I say. I prefer a tad smaller bottle, and the ph is a little lower than some other brands available here. I like the 9.5 ph but this is still a value.
customer_reviews.author: Man O. Steele

customer_reviews.title: Best Artesian Alkaline Water!
customer_reviews.text: I've been drinking Evamor for years - love the taste and the high pH stability of an artesian alkaline water. Not the easiest water to find, so I usually buy 5 to 10 cases at a time. Very, very happy that Amazon has now made this widely available, especially in Prime.
customer_reviews.author: Garth Ancier

customer_reviews.title: Clean Taste
customer_reviews.text: Nice clean refreshing taste, plus chemical free bottles. I also like the half gallon size for the fridge instead of individual bottles.

customer_reviews.title: Great Price
customer_reviews.text: Great tasting water and it seems to be doing what I wanted it to do.

customer_reviews.text: The only non-acidic natural water available commercially; but sadly, Amazon.com discontinued this product after receiving my first order! I would have continued regularly to rely upon Amazon.com as my source for this product. had it not been discontinued.
customer_reviews.author: dmstitt

customer_reviews.title: Great Water!
customer_reviews.text: This water is very refreshing and clean tasting. I do feel better since I have been drinking it, but that may be because I am drinking more water. In any case I am hooked.

customer_reviews.title: Find a local vendor
customer_reviews.text: Not worth buying online unless you live in a remote area or too lazy to go shopping. They are over priced and smaller than expected

customer_reviews.title: Save your money!
customer_reviews.text: Wow!!! $4 a bottle for this tiny bottle- straight RIP OFF. Just get this water from the grocery store. I was not paying close enough attention when I ordered- thought it was 2 six packs. NEVER AGAIN.

customer_reviews.text: Tasty water and seems to help with acid reflux, a bit expensive but it may be worth it to avoid pills.

customer_reviews.title: Worthy Water
customer_reviews.text: The Evamor Natural Alkaline Artesian Water 6 pack is a nice buy. The bottles are a great size for really satisfying one's thirst and are easy to handle. The water tastes fine.

customer_reviews.title: Great water don't buy from Amazon.
customer_reviews.text: Water is great but ridiculously overpriced can buy these for a 1.79 a bottle at whole foods and $12 for 6 at walmart.com

customer_reviews.title: GOOD STUFF.
customer_reviews.text: IT TASTE GOOD AND I FEEL GOOD. I'VE CONSUMED QUITE A FEW 20 OZ BOTTLES. AS SOON AS I GET A 12 BOTTLE SHIPMENT, I ORDER ANOTHER ONE.

customer_reviews.text: This is great to keep in the fridge instead of bulky filters and jugs of water. It tastes pure.

customer_reviews.title: good water and the price is right
customer_reviews.text: good water and the price is right. most other alkaline waters are more expensive and they don't have a good clean flavor. this does.
customer_reviews.author: bookbuyer

customer_reviews.title: Evamor Replenishes
customer_reviews.text: The Evamor alkaline water is delicious. It arrives in plastic shrink wrap and is easily removed. The water is very quenching and I use it in all my cooking, including coffee and tea.
customer_reviews.author: Fernando Marquez

customer_reviews.title: Good water
customer_reviews.text: I had this water before. I love making coffee and teas with it because the taste is smooth. I do recommend this water if you have stomach problems and/or acid refluxed. For me, it claims my stomach when upset and brings down the acid. It is a little pricey.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Theb best I've tasted. Ever!
customer_reviews.text: Best water ever BY FAR. EVERYONE SHOULD JUST SAMPLE IT BECAUSE THE OTHERS DON'T COMPARE. PLUS IT'S NATURALLY HIGH PH ALKALINE.
customer_reviews.author: Perry Smulson

customer_reviews.title: Great tasting water
customer_reviews.text: Great tasting water. However the tops were difficult to open for me only. I would definitely buy again though!
customer_reviews.author: Susan Starr

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: love it, i ordered from the pantry now and have it shipped once a month now, excellent water source
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: good taste and pH is between 8 or 9
customer_reviews.text: The water is okey, good taste and pH is between 8 or 9, the reason why I only gave it 4 star is because of the packaging. very poor packaging. When I opened the box the bottles of water are all over, good thing none of them spill.
customer_reviews.author: M. REYES

customer_reviews.title: Best Natural Alkaline Water
customer_reviews.text: This is the best water ever...literally. I've heard over and over how good it tastes ..and its alkaline. Drink to your health.I order cause it always disappears in the health food store
customer_reviews.author: CBladez

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good product !! Love the water. Found cheaper at store.
customer_reviews.author: marion burris

customer_reviews.title: I didn't like the size of the opening - a bit too ...
customer_reviews.text: I didn't like the size of the opening - a bit too big for my preferences. But the water was good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: She feels better, looks better & has more energy than I've ...
customer_reviews.text: Your product seems to help my wife's health. She swears by it. She feels better, looks better & has more energy than I've seen in her in many months. Thank you so much.
customer_reviews.author: Martin Shapiro

customer_reviews.title: Great Taste
customer_reviews.text: Price is right on par for ph waters sold in my area and actually cheaper than most local stores for this particular brand. This was helps me manage my reflux quite a bit and I've notice a huge change in how I feel everyday.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Evamor Natural Alkaline Artesian Water-32 Fl Oz (Pack of 6) -Alkaline Natural Artesian Water, Plastic Water Bottles, Recyclable
product_meta.description: Size:32 Fl Oz (Pack of 6)Evamor's rare alkaline source delivers the power of alkaline goodness in a smooth tasting, refreshing artesian spring water from a protected, rare aquifer. Now you can have the only naturally alkaline water with a pH of 8.8, from a domestic artesian aquifer. Try Evamor and taste the alkaline difference for yourself.
feature_bullets: It is a high quality healthy product
